author: intrepid42
body:
Needed for generators where weights are not stored in LHE files, e.g. Sherpa.

I suggest to just reuse the existing option `LHEweightNumber` to select which weight is to be used.

This will get another rewrite when Rivet starts to support multiple weights at once for making error bands.
title: Run RivetInterface with different genEventInfoProduct weights
